td.content: s:pt presents with 14 months history of mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech. he is a 28 YO white male dressmaker. he denies ever using cigarettes ocas ETOH on w/e o:Height 69 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

td.content: s:pt reports Body Aches from time to time. he is a m aged 29 Ys. o:Height 69 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed diclofenac - 200 mg daily, and ordered Hand Xray.

s:patient presents with Body Aches of 7 weeks duration. pt is a male dressmaker aged 30 years. Denies ever using tobacco he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 68 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:patient presents with 7 weeks history of Body Aches. he is a white male dressmaker aged 30 Ys. o:Height 68 in, Weight 169 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed naproxen - 500 mg up to 3x day, and ordered Arthroscopy - knee.

s:pt presents with mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech for 2 days. pt also reports mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous. pt is a 30 yr old white M dressmaker. o:Height 69 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

content2.Unmatched: be irritating because they are jealous
